FileFormat.FormatDescription: Hangul is a Word Processor application created by South Korean software company Hancom. HWP is the native format. A link to the file format specification can be found here: https://www.hancom.com/etc/hwpDownload.do.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: This format is based on the OLE2 Compound Document Format and can be identified in DROID 6 and later via a container signature.
